title: Native iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Â 

We are looking to hire a talented iOS developer to design, build, and maintain the next generation of iOS applications. Your primary focus will be developing high-end iOS applications for the latest Apple mobile devices. Your duties may include collaborating with the design team for new application features, identifying and fixing application bottlenecks, maintaining the core code, and updating applications published on the App Store.

iOS Developer Responsibilities:

  • Designing and building mobile applications for Apples iOS platform.
  • Collaborating with the design team to define app features.
  • Ensuring quality and performance of the application to specifications.
  • Identifying potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.
  • Fixing application bugs before the final release.
  • Publishing application on App Store.
  • Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.
  • Designing and implementing application updates.

iOS Developer Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in computer science or software engineering.
  • Proven experience as an app developer.
  • Proficient in Objective-C, Swift, and Cocoa Touch.
  • Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.
  • Knowledge of iOS back-end services.
  • Knowledge of Apples design principles and application interface guidelines.
  • Proficient in code versioning tools including Mercurial, Git, and SVN.
  • Knowledge of C-based libraries.
  • Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.
  • Experience with continuous integration.

title: Senior SAP BO Developers
jobDescription:
Â 
  • Design and Development of Reporting objects using SAP BOE tools such as Webi, Design Studio, Advanced Analysis, Crystal.
  • Multiple Data source Integration experience (SAP/Oracle/SQL) good understanding of the CMC
  • Work across timezones, within timelines in implementation, support, upgrades, POC s etc
  • Maintenance of the SAP BOE Servers.
  • Independent key role to handle the clients
  • Conduct quality reviews for ongoing projects and ensure compliance with the standards

Skills (Must Have):

  • Should be well versed with BOBJ Version 4.2 / 4.3
  • Should have worked in at least 5 Implementation, with total relevant experience of at least 5 years.
  • Should have built/support expertise with various front end tools such as WebI, Crystal, Lumira, Design Studio, Advanced Analysis as well as Scheduling and publication of reports.
  • Hands on Experience in BICS Connection using IDT and Universe Design using Universe Design / Hands on experience with Web Intelligence, QAAWS, Live Office, Advance Analysis (OLAP and MS Office), Launch pad.
  • Knowledge on SAP BW , SAP HANA and Bex Queries is must.
  • Multiple Data source Integration experience (SAP/Oracle/SQL).
  • Hands on with CMC activities.
  • Should be able to handle the client independently Email/Phone/Conference calls)
  • Candidates with good SQL knowledge shall be preferred.
  • Strong analytical and conceptual design skills; strong problem-solving skills

Mandatory People Skills

  • Should be able to work in a team.
  • Ability to produce high quality work products under pressure and within deadlines.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills with all levels of end users.

Skills (Optional):

  • Work Experience with HANA
  • Knowledge of Data Warehousing concepts and principles.
  • Experience in customer facing engagements.
  • Certification in at least one tool (BOE, Webi, Crystal etc.) (preferred)

title: Flutter Developer
tagsAndSkills: Interpersonal skills,Version control,GIT,Web services,Web development,Web designing,Mobile applications,Digital marketing
jobDescription:
We are seeking a talented Flutter Developer to join our team. As a Flutter Developer, you will be responsible for developing high-quality mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms using the Flutter framework. You will work closely with our design and development teams to create visually appealing and user-friendly mobile applications that meet our clients needs.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Develop and maintain mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise and implement solutions.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies related to mobile development.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
  • Work closely with designers to implement UI/UX designs accurately.
  • Optimize application performance for a smooth user experience.
  • Maintain documentation for code, processes, and procedures.
Requirements:
  • Proven experience as a mobile app developer using the Flutter framework.
  • Strong knowledge of Dart programming language.
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web services integration.
  • Understanding of mobile app architecture and design patterns.
  • Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work in a collaborative team environment.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • A portfolio of Flutter projects is a plus.
Benefits:
  • Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
  • Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
  • Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
  • Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.
Job Type:
  • Full-time / Freelance / Part-time / Contract
Experience:
  • A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
  • In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.
